objects.text: I'm just a simple tooltip with icon , bold, size, and even COLOR

objects.name: Hot Token Tooltip
objects.text: Counters

objects.name: Cold Token Tooltip
objects.text: Counters

objects.name: Order Token Tooltip
objects.text: Counters

objects.name: Chaos Token Tooltip
objects.text: Counters

objects.name: Joy Token Tooltip
objects.text: Counters

objects.name: Stress Token Tooltip
objects.text: Counters

objects.name: Food Token Tooltip
objects.text: Removes the first Token on the Creature

objects.name: Shield Token Tooltip
objects.text: Counters the next Token Gained, except

objects.name: Neighbor Tooltip
objects.text: A Creature that is horizontally adjacent to the current one

objects.name: Inner Tooltip
objects.text: Creature Slots # 2, 3 and 4

objects.name: Work Token Tooltip
objects.text: Used by Buildings to Produce Tokens

objects.name: Production Tooltip
objects.text: When a Building is filled with Work, it creates a new Token and places it into Storage

objects.name: Gold Token Tooltip
objects.text: Makes the target Creature use its Action

objects.name: Outer Tooltip
objects.text: Creature Slots # 1 and 5

objects.name: Survival Tooltip
objects.text: This condition must be met on the final Eclipse Turn to win the game

objects.name: Omen Tooltip
objects.text: Activates when all Token Slots are filled with

objects.name: Creature Work Tooltip
objects.text: Creates a Work Token and gives it to the Building on the same Lane

objects.name: Token Gain Tooltip
objects.text: The process of receiving a Token from any source

objects.name: Action Tooltip
objects.text: Basic ability of the Card that is used on its Turn

objects.name: Event Activation Tooltip
objects.text: Ability that is used after Event Timer reaches 0

objects.name: Destruction Tooltip
objects.text: A Card or Token that gets Destroyed immediately leaves the game.

objects.name: Lane Tooltip
objects.text: A separate part of your Realm. Includes 1 {Bulding} Slot and 5 Creature slots on the same row.

objects.name: Death Tooltip
objects.text: When a Creature's Token Slots are filled, it gets Destroyed and loses all its Tokens.

objects.name: Omen Token Tooltip
objects.text: Measures the time until a new Eclipse Omen activation

objects.name: Number of non-creatures drawn
objects.admin_descr: Int. Number of non-creatures drawn in a row
